answers.answer: Glucose is sugar. So I'm guessing you don't have tolerance for a lot of sugar. How often do you like to eat sugary sweet foods?
Hmmm well, I'm not sure.  I passed my glucose tolerance test but they also said it was a lil low, I'm not sure what that means though.. but I'm one who only can handle sweets every now and then.

question: Says I have glucose intolerance. What's the difference???
title: my succor days I don't have gestational diabetes but....
